He is one I picked up tonight. I assume these are both Kakumon ?, Is the 
split bamboo a family emblem ?, it looks familiar. I don't know the 
other mon.

85 x 80 x 6mm

Looks mid Edo Akasaka to me, thoughts ?

Rich
